c56c8265c848.title: The arctic ice mostly hurts the wild life and will cause mass extinctions of many species.

paragraphs.name: dba9
paragraphs.text: The arctic ice mostly hurts the wild life and will cause mass extinctions of many species. It is the glaziers, the ice on the land, melting that will cause the sea level rising, increasing the flooding of low lying lands around the world. The Arctic ice melting is a good indication that the earths temperature is constantly rising.

dfc589588206.title: Regarding climate changes, we’re told irreversible tipping points may be passed without being well…

paragraphs.text:
Regarding climate changes, we’re told irreversible tipping points may be passed without being well noticed at the time.
IMHO, the election of Trump is the “Mother of all Tipping Points”. It makes most if not all the other little tipping points inevitable.
That realization will become generally accepted knowledge in the near future.

paragraphs.text: James Balog’s Emmy Award winning film Chasing Ice has been able to convince some conservative audiences that the melting is off the charts. I highly recommend using it “to break the ice”. https://chasingice.com
Moving, beautiful, makes people care.

paragraphs.text: It would be very easy to quickly convince the masses of the dire nature of our catastrophic climate change predicament. Manipulation of billions of human minds occurs daily under the umbrella of mainstream media’s mastery. If honest, truthful education became the mission of mass media, nearly every adult on the planet would intimately know the monster humans have created... in less than a week.

paragraphs.name: 61a9
paragraphs.text: I checked the PIOMAS data. The PIOMAS curve from Wikipedia is completely different. Also, the PIOMAS simulation does not match well and is too pessimistic with respect to actual measurements by Cryosat. The Wikipedia curve even show signs of reversal (higher tops, higher minima) near the end. Completely contrary to the article that shows a curve with…
